metadata.description: The preferred language for the emails sent to the admin email alias, which is specified in theAdmin eMail environment variable. Default is en-US
Yes by default. Set to No if you are creating a dev type envt. This will allow some flows to set target users to the admin instead of resource owners
CoE Admin eMail. Email address used in flows to send notifications to admins; this should be either your email address or a distribution list

Environment_record_was_not_linked_to_thi.inputs: Environment record was not linked to this request

If_Environment_is_linked.description: Check if coe_environment is not null or length is greater than 0

Delete_Expired_Environments.description: Deletes the expired environments and changes the status of the associated Request to inactive

Filter_array_-_Expired_Requests.description: Environment Requests that have already expired (date is past/less than today)

Filter_array_-_Requests_expiring_soon.description: Environment Requests that have already expired (date is past/less than today)

Get_Environment_from_Power_Platform_resp.description: Look for Environment item in response from Power Platform API, which represents the actual environment count

Environment_exists_in_Power_Platform_API.description: True == Environment was not deleted manually

Update_Live_Environment_Creation_Request.description: Updates the Request record if the environment has been manually deleted (as opposed to being cleaned up), and whether an environment was created and associated to the Request record successfully.

parameters.$filter: admin_basedon eq '@{outputs('emailGUID_to_en-US_2')}' and admin_language eq '@{parameters('Admin eMail Preferred Language (admin_AdmineMailPreferredLanguage)')}'

parameters.$select: admin_body, admin_cc, admin_replyto, admin_sendonbehalf, admin_subject, admin_importance

body.text_1:
@{outputs('Get_a_row_by_ID_2')?['body/admin_body']} Details
Environment name: @{items('Apply_to_each_Expiring_Environment_Request')?['coe_envdisplayname']}
Environment Id: @{items('Apply_to_each_Expiring_Environment_Request')?['coe_environment_value']}
Expiration date: @{items('Apply_to_each_Expiring_Environment_Request')?['coe_expirationdate']}
